messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to cut carbon emissions, protect frontline NHS services, support young people with mental health challenges, and improve our local transport services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems have pledged to scrap student tuition fees, contrasting their position with Labour and Conservatives.
Alan Beddow joined demonstrators in Warwick protesting plans to close Warwick Fire Station, highlighting the party's commitment to community services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everything to play for in the Warwick & Leamington Parliamentary Constituency

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will take urgent action to stimulate the economy and support local businesses.
issues.education: Lib Dems pledge to scrap student tuition fees.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will cut carbon emissions.
issues.health: The party promises to take action to protect frontline NHS services and support young people with mental health challenges.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's time for REAL change in Warwick & Leamington

politicalExperience.achievements: Alan Beddow is the former Mayor of Leamington.

images.caption: Alan Beddow with demonstrators protesting the closure of Warwick Fire Station.
Alan Beddow talking to Warwick University students about the Lib Dems' commitment to abolish tuition fees.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Labour's failed budget let us down once more
